akn:section.akn:heading: Hydrogen and Fuel Cell Technical Task Force

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment Not later than 120 days after August 8, 2005, the President shall establish an interagency task force chaired by the Secretary with representatives from each of the following:

(c) Agency cooperation The heads of all agencies, including those whose agencies are not represented on the Task Force, shall cooperate with and furnish information to the Task Force, the Technical Advisory Committee, and the Department.
